name: Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - All drawings are for construction and latest revision.
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Drawing Register
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Approved construction plan & sequence drafted and briefed to all involved with activity prior to construction. Includes any isolation permits for tie ins.
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Approved Workpack Isolation Permit
3.1 Pipe & Pipe Fitting (Flanges, Elbows, Tees etc.)
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Confirm pipe and pipe fitting materials are correct; material grade, size, rating etc. on delivery
Acceptance Criteria - Pipe Data Sheet, Supplier Packing Slips
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Supplier Packing Slips
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Confirm nuts and bolt materials are stainless steel grade 316
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Supplier Packing Slips
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Confirm consumable materials are correct on delivery
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Supplier Packing Slips
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Check pipe materials, tanks, structural steel and dosing cabinets are undamaged; not misshapen, no surface damage, free from contaminants etc. on delivery
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-002

Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - For project entirety store materials in clean environment, protected from external damage; cover flange faces, store off ground using pallets. Ensure materials are free from contaminants and foreign debris.
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - N/A
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Handle materials with care and with the correct equipment (gloves, slings etc.)
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - N/A
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install pipe supports in the correct locations before pipe installation
Acceptance Criteria - As per pipe manufacturer specifications
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Redline Drawings, ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Survey and mark the correct locations of all pipes, tanks, structures and equipment before installation
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Survey Record, Redline Drawings, ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install piping on the pipe supports during construction
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install tank in correct location and orientation as specified in IFC mechanical layout drawings and tank manufacturers drawings
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install access platforms in correct location and orientation as specified in IFC mechanical layout drawings and manufacturers drawings
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install cabinet in correct location and orientation as specified in IFC mechanical layout drawings and manufacturers drawings
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Install safety shower in correct location as specified in IFC mechanical layout drawings
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
5.8 Install new nozzles into Existing Raw Water Pipework
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Hot tap into Raw water pipework for new Flow Switch and Fluoride Dose point at correct locations
Acceptance Criteria - IFC Drawings, Flow Switch O&M manual
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - ITC-02
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - All Fluoride dosing pipelines to be hydrotested 1.5 times the maximum working pressure for 15 minutes and inspected for leaks
Verification Records of Inspection(s) / Test(s) - Pressure Test Records
Type of inspect / Test and Frequency - Redline P&ID Drawings and Mechanical Drawings Sets post construction
